manipulated_prompt_obj.inputs:
<s> [INST] You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Music
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Two years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: PostDoc
OTHER-SKILLS: Cooking
AVAILABILITY: As soon as possible

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start. ME:  If I asked the interviewer what area you studied, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no. [/INST]

raw_response_obj.content: ASIDE: Yes, I studied Music for my Bachelor's degree.
